Judul: Highly selective separation of Re(VII) from Mo(VI) by using biomaterialbased ionic gel adsorbents: Extractive adsorption enrichment of Re and surface blocking of Mo
Abstrak:
It is urgently needed to develop highly efficient and selective adsorbents for enrichment and separation of Re
(VII) from Mo(VI) to obtain metallic rhenium. By tuning cross-link of chitosan, ionic gel capsules (CSN) were
prepared, which had a core-shell structure and wrapped N263 (methyl trioctyl ammonium chloride) as an extractant. After being characterized, the CSN capsules were used as a green adsorbent for separation .....
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Xuelin Dongb, Lihua Zhu, Heqing Tang
Kata Kunci: Ionic gel, Chitosan, Quaternary ammonium, Rhenium, Molybdenum, Extractive adsorption
